author: Zuko
text: “In the darkness, hope is something you give yourself.”

author: Zuko
text: “Never forget who you are, for surely the world won’t.”

author: Zuko
text: “Bad skin?! Normal teenagers worry about bad skin, I don’t have that luxury.”

author: Zuko
text: “Why am I so bad at being good?”

author: Lion Turtle
text: “The true mind can weather all lies and illusions without being lost. The true heart can touch the poison of hatred without being harmed. From beginningless time, darkness thrives in the void, but always yields to purifying light.”

author: Piandao
text: “The way of the sword doesn’t belong to any one nation. Knowledge of the arts belongs to us all.”

author: Iroh
text: “It is important to draw wisdom from different places. If you take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale.”

author: Iroh
text: “Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.”

author: Iroh
text: “Prince Zuko, pride is not the opposite of shame, but rather it’s source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.”

author: Iroh
text: “Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else.”

author: Iroh
text: “You must look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self reveal itself.”

author: Iroh
text: “Only once every hundred years can a Firebender experience this kind of power.”

author: Iroh
text: “It’s always best to believe in one’s self but a little help from others can be a great blessing!”

author: Iroh
text: “I know you’re not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but it’s just so sad!”

author: Iroh
text: “You are not the man you used to be. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you ever used to be. And now you have come at the crossroads of destiny. It’s time for you to choose. It’s time for you to choose good.”

author: Iroh
text: “You may not always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you keep moving, you will come to a better place.”

author: Iroh
text: “The coin is appreciated…but not as much as your smile.”

author: Iroh
text: “There are reasons each of us are born. We have to find those reasons.”

author: Iroh
text: “Who knew that floating on a piece of drift wood for three weeks with no food or water… and sea vultures waiting to pluck out your liver could make one so tense.”

author: Iroh
text: “Protection and power are overrated. I think you are very wise to choose happiness and love.”

author: Katara
text: “I wanted to do it. I wanted to take out all my anger at him. But… I couldn’t. I don’t know if it’s because I’m too weak to do it, or if it’s because I’m strong enough not to.”

author: Katara
text: “Get over here, Zuko. Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs.”

author: Katara
text: “The stars sure are beautiful tonight. Too bad you can’t see them, Toph!”

author: Katara
text: “Love is brightest in the dark.”

author: Sokka
text: “Look, I hate to be the wet blanket here, but since Katara’s busy, I guess it’s up to me.”

author: Sokka
text: “You’re awfully cute, but unfortunately for you, you’re made of meat.”

author: Sokka
text: “Simple: girls are better at fixing pants than guys, and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that. It’s just the natural order of things.”

author: Sokka
text: “Stop! Stop it right now! What’s wrong with you? We don’t have time for fun and games with the war going on.”

author: Sokka
text: “I’m too young to die!”

author: Azula
text: “In my country, we exchange a pleasant “hello” before asking questions.”

author: Azula
text: “Don’t you know that fans only make flames stronger?”

author: Azula
text: “My own mother thought I was a monster. She was right of course… but it still hurt.”

author: Azula
text: “Why would father want YOU back? Except to lock you up where you can no longer embarrass him!”

author: Toph Bei Fong
text: “I’ve seen enough of Ba Sing Sei. And I can’t even see!”

author: Toph Bei Fong
text: “Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it tastes like sand. I never thought I would miss the taste of mud so much.”

author: King Bumi
text: “You need to find someone who WAITS and LISTENS before striking.”

author: King Bumi
text: “I didn’t know what or when, but I knew I’d know it when I knew it!”

author: Roku
text: “If I had been more decisive, and acted sooner, I could have stopped Sozin, and stopped the war before it started. I offer you this wisdom, Aang, you must be decisive.”

author: Roku
text: “The avatar state is a defence mechanism – designed to empower you with all the skills and knowledge of the past avatars. The glow is the combination of all your past lives. Focusing their energy to your body.”

author: Sozin
text: “With Roku gone and the Great Comet returning, the timing was perfect to change the world. I knew the next Avatar would be born an Air Nomad so I wiped out the Air Temples, but somehow the new Avatar eluded me. I wasted the remainder of my life searching in vain. I know he’s hiding out there somewhere: the Fire Nation’s greatest threat, the last Airbender.”

author: Sozin
text: “Without you, all my plans are suddenly possible. I have a vision for the future, Roku.”

author: Pathik
text: “I know I am not the person you expected…and I did not expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now.”

author: Ty Lee
text: “Nice speech, Azula! It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way!”

author: Aang
text: “The past can be a great teacher.”

author: Aang
text: “If you want to be a bender, you have to let go of fear.”

author: Aang
text: “This isn’t about finding a teacher. This is about finding my friend.”

author: Aang
text: “When we hit our lowest point, we are open to the greatest change.”

author: Aang
text: “I was in the avatar state… But I was outside my body watching myself. It was scary. I was scary…”

author: Jeong Jeong
text: “Water brings healing and life. But fire brings only destruction and pain. It forces those of us burdened with its care to walk a razor’s edge between humanity and savagery. Eventually, we are torn apart.”

author: Jeong Jeong
text: “Destiny? What would a boy know of destiny? If a fish lives its whole life in this river, does he know the river’s destiny? No! Only that it runs on and on out of his control. He may follow where it flows, but he cannot see the end. He cannot imagine the ocean.”

author: Jeong Jeong
text: “To master the bending disciplines you must first master discipline itself, but you have no interest in this so I have no interest in you.”

author: Mai
text: “There really is no fathoming the depths of my hatred for this place.”
